en.title: **Bachelor** in Information Management
en.text: Earned a Bachelor's degree in Information Management, focusing on algorithms, data structures, software engineering, and web development. Gained hands-on experience through various programming projects.

zh.title: 資訊管理**學士**
zh.text: 獲得資訊管理學士學位，涉略演算法、資料結構、軟體工程和網頁開發，並透過各種程式設計專案獲得實作經驗。

course.zh: 全民國防教育軍事訓練
